modName: SidePannels Pickaxe Woodcuttingaxe Knife Fork and more
summary:
Build and Sharpen your tools/weapons of destruction.
Want to use the Wood Cutters Axe or Pickaxe as a weapon but can't upgrade them?
I got ya covered.
Also Included Knife and Fork, Plus more bonus content.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=5]INTRODUCTION[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=5][/size][/color]

Created by request.

Craftable and Upgradeable Woodcutters Axe and Pickaxe.

Also Included another request.

Craftable and Upgradeable Knife and Fork.

Plus More Bonus Content


[color=#ff0000][size=4]Also Available In Skyrim SE[/size][/color]

Check it out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/852/?]HERE[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color]

Add's the re-named Wood Axe and Mining Pickaxe to Steel Category ( re-named so they do not alter vanilla items)


Also adds the Knife and Fork to the Iron Category ( Standalone does not alter the vanilla items)
The starting damage has been upgraded but balanced, they can be upgraded on the sharpening wheel and enchanted.


The Bonus are two Unique items hidden in the word
The Hand Axe of Haste and the Great Axe of Haste, Location hints will be in photo's


[color=#ff0000][size=5]FAQ[/size][/color]
[size=4]
Will these items hurt, crash or slow down my skyrim?[/size]
No they will not, what ever setup you are running will not be affected by this mod, it uses no scripts and vanilla assets.
The items were duplicated and edited not effecting or changing the vanilla items so no conflicts will occur.

[size=4]Where Do I find the items?[/size]
Well The Knife, Fork, Pickaxe and Wood Axe can be crafted.
The Pick Axe and Wood Axe are in steel category, And Knife and Fork are in the Iron Category as stated above.
And the bonus items well Happy Treasure Hunting :)


[color=#ff0000][size=5]INSTALLATION[/size][/color]

Use NMM, or simply unzip the contents of the file into your Skyrim Data Folder


[color=#ff0000][size=5]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/color]

Should be compatible with everything, No Vanilla items where changed so any mod requiring them will work fine.
No scripts so there wont be any conflicts with other scripts.
So I doubt there will be any issue, should one occur leave a comment or message me and explain it and it will be fixed.


[color=#ff0000][size=4]Changelog[/size][/color]

v1.1
Fixed Issue with Wood Axe not being useable at chopping block for some users.


[color=#ff0000][size=5]Enjoy![/size][/color]

I hope you enjoy this simple mod

-SidePannel

Creepy zombies by [b]FUTOSHI[/b][/url]
